Label: (LOC_OS03G05710.1)
Comment: Catalyzes the convertion of serotonin into one of four products depending on the other reactants available: caffeoylserotonin, feruloylserotonin, p-coumaroylserotonin or cinnamoylserotonin.

Comment: Catalyzes the convertion of serotonin into one of four products depending on the other reactants available: caffeoylserotonin, feruloylserotonin, p-coumaroylserotonin or cinnamoylserotonin.

Label: decarboxylase
Comment: Catalyzes the convertion of L-tryptophan into tryptamine.

Label: 5-hydroxylase
Comment: Catalyzes the convertion of tryptamine into serotonin.
